properties.name: Arminius, rebel general - 9 AD
properties.author: Haemimont Games
properties.description: Rome aspires to expand its dominion beyond the Rhine, a territory made hostile by the presence of Germanic tribes.\nGovernor Publius Quintilius Varus takes on the task of securing a new frontier for Rome on the banks of the Elbe river.\nAmong his troops is Arminius, a general of Germanic origin ready to deny Rome in defense of his people...
